ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is a lot of work. I spent a lot of time feeling intimidated and lost. But the professor is a great teacher and the classroom experience is positive, fun, and often quite entertaining.

This is a great course for students with a solid background in Kiswahili who want to improve their writing, sophisticate their vocabulary and drill down on intermediate grammar topics.I would especially recommend this course to students who have already achieved conversational fluency in Kiswahili but who perhaps need practice with reading and writing.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It was important for me to continue with this language so that I am prepared to use it during my upcoming fieldwork.
